# 2018 Queen's Club Championships – Wheelchair doubles__disambig_1

Stéphane Houdet Nicolas Peifer
| type     = queensclubtennistournament
| edition  = 1st
}}
Stéphane Houdet and Nicolas Peifer won the first Wheelchair Doubles title at the Queen's Club Championships in a round robin.
